vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.4.20;
son of: Nahshon (H5177);
husband of: Rahab (H7343);
father of: Boaz (H1162); also called Sala at Luk.3.32;
§ Salma = "garment"
1) father of Boaz, father-in-law of Ruth, and grandfather of David
1a) also 'Salmon', 'Salmah'
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (2a) שַׂלְמוֹן ,שַׂלְמָה   hijo de Nahasón; tribu de Judá; (2b)   descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá; fundador de Belén
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
撒門 或 薩瑪 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "服飾"
波阿斯之父, 路得的岳父, 大衛的祖父(代上 2:11,2:51,54)
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
撒门 或 萨玛 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "服饰"
波阿斯之父, 路得的岳父, 大卫的祖父(代上 2:11,2:51,54)

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.51;
son of: Hur (H2354);
brother of: Uri (H0221), Shobal (H7732H), Hareph (H2780), Jezreel (H3157J), Ishma (H3457), Idbash (H3031), Hazzelelponi (H6753), Penuel (H6439H) and Ezer (H5829)
§ Salma = "garment"
1) father of Boaz, father-in-law of Ruth, and grandfather of David
1a) also 'Salmon', 'Salmah'
